meta.title: Help Us Our God
meta.subtitle: Psalm 79:9
meta.comment:
Brian Doerksen & Cindy Rethmeier
1991 Mercy Publishing

lines.text: For the glory of Your name
For the glory of Your kingom
Deliver us  and atone for our sins
Deliver us  and forgive all our sins
We come to You desp'rately needy
May Your mercy come quickly to meet us
Help us our God (help us our God)
Help us our God (help us our God)
Help us our God  for Your Name's sake
